title: Chargrilled aubergine and red pepper roll-ups
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, peeled and sliced lengthwise into thin slices', 'salt as needed', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '1 pinch Italian herb seasoning, or to taste', '1 (125g) log goat cheese, softened', '2 whole roasted red peppers from a jar, drained and diced']
